description: Jeremy Renner has joined Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Robert Downey Jr.
title: Civil War" cast mates at Atlanta
title_page: Jeremy Renner joins "Captain America: Civil War" cast mates at Atlanta
text:
Jeremy Renner has joined Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Robert Downey Jr., Anthony Mackie, Frank Grillo and other members of the "Captain America: Civil War" team.
Photo: Atlanta Filming
The Marvel threequel has been filming in downtown Atlanta, following stints in Buckhead and Midtown.
